text: This unexpected talkshow conversation about serial killer traits started when Snow was explaining why she and her fellow Pitch Perfect cast members were afraid of Kendrick when they first met her. She said, "I just thought she was scary because every time I would go over and visit her in her apartment or hotel or on any vacation, she always had her sunglasses completely lined up one-by-one, symmetrically in rows." As if to justify this strange behavior, Kendrick jumped in and explained that per Snow's theory, having to have her many pairs of sunglasses perfectly organized everywhere she goes, is just her serial killer trait.
